Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kedzie-Homan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kedzie-Homan.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Damen.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
